thread.title: SAT defers hearing on DLF plea till November 24
thread.title_full: SAT defers hearing on DLF plea till November 24

author: tribuneindia.com
title: SAT defers hearing on DLF plea till November 24
text:
Mumbai
The Securities Appellate Tribunal on Thursday adjourned till November 24 the hearing on DLFâ€™s plea against the Rs 86 crore penalty imposed on it by SEBI for fraudulent transactions to mislead IPO investors in 2007. PTI Chandigarh
CPI-IW up 1 point in Aug The Consumer Price Index for Industrial Workers (CPI-IW) for August rose by 1 point from 263 points in July to 264 points. TNS New Delhi
L&T managing director retires L&T on Thursday said its MD & CEO K Venkataramanan has retired from the company. PTI
